text: I took them off my phone and I'm way more productive.
author: iandenisjohnson

text: Outtakes from my interview with Sherry Lee of Taiwan's The Reporter magazine. Some musings on how to work as a reporter, the time it takes to get ordinary people to open up (10-15 days) and why it's better to practice journalism than study it. (In Chinese)
author: iandenisjohnson

text: Thanks to @initiumnews for this long interview in Chinese on politics, faith, values, and religion. 再訪 Ian Johnson：宗教復興遭遇收緊的宗教治理，中國要打起「靈魂之戰」嗎？｜深度｜探索學院｜端傳媒 Initium Media
author: iandenisjohnson

text:
More great stuff from the "Reading the Chinese Dream" series--this one a David Ownby translation of Qin Hui's essay on the antebellum South--but part of a broader issue touching on China: low human rights, low costs production models. 
https://www.readingthechinadream.com/qin-hui-tariffs-and-systems.html … …
author: iandenisjohnson
